title: Ollama-Mcp-Db
description: An interactive chat interface that uses Ollama's LLM and PostgreSQL integration via MCP for natural language to SQL query generation.
creator: robdodson

DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL connection string in the format postgresql://user:password@host:port/dbname

OLLAMA_MODEL.description: The Ollama model to use for generating SQL queries (default is qwen2.5-coder:7b-instruct)
